dc_description_s: Bloomington parks and recreation facility areas exported from the CIty's GIS. See summary description (txt) file for information about intended use, projection, currency, attributes, etc.This map data layer represents the parks and recreations facility areas owned or maintained by the City of Bloomington, Indiana. It contains features such as city community parks, nature preserves, recreational sports facilities, recreation centers, cemeteries, pools, and more.Bloomington Parks and Recreation maintained multi-use trails can be found in the Bicycle and Pedestrian Facilities Trails and Paths. The related Bloomington Parks & Recreation Facilities Location Points data set contains additional attributesFor existing static maps in pdf format See the [Bloomington Parks and Recreation Facilities Maps ](https://bloomington.in.gov/data/dataset/bloomington-parks-and-recreation-facilities-maps) Map Gallery
dc_title_s: Parks and Recreation Areas: Boomington, Indiana
